blogPost.title: What does the future of fatherhood look like? Answer by @kkteily, CEO of @legacy. https://t.co/mBbgvKWLqX https://t.co/LhqqBlGAzm

localize.full_text: 父亲的未来是什么样子的？由@legacy的首席执行官@kkteily回答。https://t.co/mBbgvKWLqX https://t.co/LhqqBlGAzm。

previous.title: What has your experience been like as a woman tech founder? Answer by Emily Kennedy, Founder & President of Marinus Analytics. https://t.co/OI6F5wuRLV https://t.co/UpXd75pYf1

localize.full_text: 作为一名女性科技创始人，你的经历是怎样的？回答者：Emily Kennedy，Marinus Analytics的创始人&总裁。https://t.co/OI6F5wuRLV https://t.co/UpXd75pYf1。
